email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. Following up on our call earlier, I’m pleased to offer a freight rate of $50.75 per metric ton for the crude oil shipment from Rotterdam to Singapore. The vessel 'Ocean Voyager' is available with a DWT of 150,000 and an LOA of 250 meters. Laycan is set for October 15-20. Let me know your thoughts. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Would you consider coming down to the low 50s, say $50.25? Also, can you confirm the vessel’s availability for October 15-20? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can offer $50.50 per metric ton, which is competitive given the vessel’s specifications and availability. The 'Ocean Voyager' is confirmed for the laycan of October 15-20. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.50 sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the demurrage rate? Also, please send over the charter party agreement for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. The demurrage rate is set at $25,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Let me know if you need any further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The demurrage rate is acceptable. I’ve reviewed the charter party agreement and everything looks good. Let’s finalize the deal. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, excellent! I’ll proceed with finalizing the deal. The freight rate is confirmed at $50.50 per metric ton, with laycan October 15-20 and demurrage at $25,000 per day. I’ll send the finalized documents shortly. Thanks for your cooperation. Best, Sarah
